column4: IT prints but it gives me PCL errors and on the window when using with ubuntu
I read up and saw that a newer version of GhostScript takes care of this
will evolution connect to an echange server?
if outlook-web-access is enabled on that exchange server
apt-cache search linux-source to see all available
you don't need to compile a kernel just for the lirc modules
just making sure.  You could simply build the modules against the headers
